title: Ticket #5363: Specify lease deadline, not duration.
description:
We currently specify a lease duration; it must be specified as a deadline for idempotence. This implies the ability to update the deadline on the fly, which may be its own subticket.

If we decide it's important, we'll have to add a subticket for updating the master's suicide clock; otherwise we'll just remove it.

We should also disallow long leases (> 36 hours), because otherwise people will forget to renew them.
remarks:
2015-Nov-20 11:36:52 by tlmiller:
Amazon doesn't allow alarm durations of more than 24 hours (23:54, actually?), so at least until further notice we won't either.

2015-Dec-18 09:58:40 by tlmiller:
The expiry-update code isn't working quite right at the moment, so don't forget to fix it.
